annotations.note: Registered scripts will only be applied to newly opened message composer tabs. To apply the script to already open message composer tab, manually inject your script by calling $(ref:tabs.executeScript) for each of the open <var>messageCompose</var> tabs.

Registered scripts will only be applied to newly opened messages. To apply the script to already open messages, manually inject your script by calling $(ref:tabs.executeScript) for each of the open <var>messageDisplay</var> tabs.
